name: AirJump
description:
This is a client-side mod that helps users to fly.
Mod Features: 
    - AirJump (You can jump even you are in mid-air)
    - SuperLaunch (Hold SuperLaunch item on MainHand or OffHand and use right click to launch forward)
    - NoFall (No Fall damage)(Not work when hold mace in the MainHand and ware elytra)
